properties.name: h2.tcp.enabled
properties.description: To enable / disable TCP connection to the H2 embedded database through external SQL clients such as SQUIRREL-SQL, TOAD, etc.

properties.name: h2.tcp.port
properties.description: TCP port to listen to for external SQL client connections

properties.name: h2.web.enabled
properties.description: To enable / disable the embedded web server to manage database (H2 console)

properties.name: h2.web.port
properties.description: TCP port for the embedded web server with the H2 console. Users will be able to check the DB content on http://localhost:port

properties.name: javafx.title
properties.description: Name of the JavaFX application's window

properties.name: javafx.stage.resizable
properties.description: To enable / disable the ability to resize the window

properties.name: javafx.css
properties.description: List of CSS file(s) to load on  - This must be a comma separated list

properties.name: javafx.appicons
properties.description: Application icons. This must be a comma separated list that contains files in different sizes. ex: /img/app_icons/wordpress_16x16.png,/img/app_icons/wordpress_32x32.png,/img/app_icons/wordpress_48x48.png,/img/app_icons/wordpress_64x64.png,/img/app_icons/wordpress_128x128.png

properties.name: javafx.stage.style
properties.description: To set the application look and feel style, see javafx.stage.StageStyle . It must match an enum value
